SELECT_ONE
func:
msg.topic += " LIMIT 1"; 

return msg

name: InitConst
func:
context.global.sqlTableName = "CoffeeIntake"

return { payload: context }

name: Drop
Create
Insert
func:
var table_name = "test_1";// context.global.sqlTableName

create = {
	topic: 
		"insert into " + table_name		+
		"(UserId, Intake) values ('1','1')"
}

return create

name: SELECT
params_parser
params_parser
commands
info:
GET /sqlite/select or /sqlite/select_one
url parameter:
1. table_name (string)
2. where (json string) e.g.: 
[{
  col:"username", op:"like", val:"%test%", chain_op:"or"
},{...}]

POST /sqlite/create
x-www-form-url-encoded
1. table_name (string)
2. table_params (json string) e.g.: 
[{  
  col:"UserId", type:"integer", option:"NOT NULL UNIQUE" 
},{...}]

POST /sqlite/insert
x-www-form-url-encoded
1. table_name (string)
2. cols (json array) e.g.: [user_id, username]
3. vals (json array) e.g.: [1,'user_a']

POST /sqlite/update
x-www-form-url-encoded
1. table_name (string)
2. cols (json array) e.g.: [user_id, username]
3. vals (json array) e.g.: [1,'user_a']
4. where (json string) e.g.: 
[{
  col:"username", op:"like", val:"%test%", chain_op:"or"
},{...}]

DELETE /sqlite/delete
url parameter
1. table_name (string) 
2. where (json string) e.g.: 
[{
  col:"username", op:"like", val:"%test%", chain_op:"or"
},{...}]

DROP /sqlite/drop
url parameter
1. table_name (string)
